name: Dark Athel

skills.name: Profane Glaive
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 40% chance of placing 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 1.6 ATK

skills.name: Blades of Blood (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.6 ATK

skills.name: Harvest of Despair (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 3 turns if this attack kills 4 or more enemies. Heals this champion by 50% of their MAX HP if this attack kills 6 or more enemies. Grants an Extra Turn if this attack kills 10 or more enemies.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.65 ATK

forms.aura: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 20%
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: ATK% nuker build: 170-200 SPD (speed tune), 150-200 ACC (Decrease DEF), 100% C.RATE, 200% C.DMG, HP% survivability. Issue: Low damage multipliers, outperformed by starters.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: Wave clear build: 180 SPD, 150 ACC (Decrease SPD/DEF), 100% C.RATE, 200% C.DMG, ATK%. Lifesteal for sustain (glass cannon survivability). Good for early/mid waves, weak for boss nuking.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: AOE trash clear: 180 SPD, 150 ACC, 100% C.RATE, ATK%. Struggles in Hard mode (low multipliers). Harvest of Despair requires 4+ kills (impractical most content).
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: Nuker build: 200-220 SPD (after speed lead), 100% C.RATE, 250% C.DMG, ATK%. Issue: Outperformed by starters (Athel/Elhain), low base ATK 1465. Decrease DEF A1 useful setup.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: Undead Hordes carry: 180 SPD, 150 ACC, 100% C.RATE, ATK%, HP% survivability. Community consensus: Useful early FW, replaced mid-game by better Undead epics/legos.

recommended_gear: Lifesteal + Speed (PVE primary): Sustain glass cannon, wave clear dungeons 1-15. Lifesteal offsets low HP pool.
Savage + Cruel (Arena nuker): Maximize damage output, Decrease DEF A1 setup. Issue: Still outperformed by starters.
Speed + Accuracy (Dungeon waves): Early/mid game wave clear, Decrease SPD A2 control. Replaced by better AOE champions late-game.
Bloodthirst (Campaign farmer): Self-sustain AOE farm, but starters faster/safer. Saurus (Uncommon) outperforms for early Nightmare.
Relentless (Doom Tower trash): Cycle of Violence mastery synergy, but impractical (A3 requires 4+ kills, most content 5 max enemies).

clan_boss: Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Shield Breaker, Whirlwind of Death, Single Out, Cycle of Violence, Bring it Down, Kill Streak, Methodical, Warmaster (T6)
Support tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Arcane Celerity, Evil Eye, Master Hexer (Decrease DEF extension)
Focus: Warmaster for Clan Boss damage, Master Hexer extend Decrease DEF 60% uptime, ACC for debuff landing
dungeons: Same as Clan Boss build (Warmaster + Master Hexer)
Cycle of Violence synergy: A3→A2→A1→repeat (community noted, requires booking A3/A2 cooldowns)
Lifesteal gear + Cycle of Violence = continuous wave clear early/mid game
arena: Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Shield Breaker, Whirlwind of Death, Cycle of Violence, Blood Shield, Flawless Execution (T6 nuker)
Support tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Arcane Celerity, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, Lore of Steel, Sniper, Master Hexer
Focus: Flawless Execution for arena nuking, Master Hexer extend Decrease DEF setup
doom_tower: Same as Dungeons build (Warmaster + Cycle of Violence)
Issue: Harvest of Despair (A3) requires 4+ kills for buffs, 6+ for heal, 10+ for Extra Turn - impractical most Doom Tower content (5 max enemies standard)
faction_wars: Same as Dungeons build (Warmaster + Cycle of Violence + Master Hexer)
Undead Hordes faction: Useful early FW, replaced mid-game by better epics
general: Offense tree primary (Attack role, ATK scaling damage)
Support tree secondary (Pinpoint Accuracy + Master Hexer for debuff extension)

blessings: Cruelty (Debuffer role): Extend Decrease DEF/SPD duration, but low impact (underwhelming damage multipliers).
Hero's Soul (Mobber role): AOE wave clear synergy, early/mid game dungeons. Outperformed late-game.
Phantom Touch (Damage Dealer): Arena nuking, but better options exist (starters Athel/Elhain).

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior acceptable. Prioritizes A3 (Harvest of Despair AOE) > A2 (Blades of Blood AOE Decrease SPD) > A1 (Profane Glaive Decrease DEF). Good for auto-play wave clear.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not cheese viable. Harvest of Despair (A3) requires 4+ kills for Increase SPD buff, 6+ for heal, 10+ for Extra Turn - impractical most content (Spider max 19 spiderlings, but low multipliers vs mother). Community consensus: DESIGNED for Spider (spiderlings), but FAILS to perform (low damage, outperformed by Athel/Elhain/Coldheart/Bellower).

mechanics_advisory: TRAP CHAMPION - Epic rarity, scarce tome investment NOT justified. 90-day login reward, FREE but WEAK. Community consensus: 'Needs buff', 'Overshadowed by starter rares', 'Better options exist for all content'. Ayumilove B-rank SITUATIONAL. HellHades rating LOW across the board. Use case: Early/mid game player WITHOUT better AOE champions (Athel, Elhain, Kael, Bellower, Coldheart). Vault once better option acquired. SKILL ANALYSIS: A1 Decrease DEF 60% (40%→50% booked, 2-hit) - OKAY setup debuffer. A2 Blades of Blood (Decrease SPD 30%, AOE, CD 5→4 booked) - UNDERWHELMING control. A3 Harvest of Despair (AOE, Increase SPD/heal/Extra Turn conditional 4+/6+/10+ kills) - DESIGNED for Spider spiderlings, FAILS due to low 3.65 ATK multiplier. Community quote: 'Saurus (Uncommon) clears Nightmare Campaign faster', 'Dark Athel what do I do with her now?', 'She doesn't hit hard vs other epics', 'Very difficult to keep alive'. Historical context: Pre-Doom Tower (Dec 2020), pre-Hydra (2021+), designed for Spider only - still underperforms. FREE EPIC BOOKS: If pulled duplicates, use as skill books for better Undead epics. AURA: +20% ATK all battles - generic, not specialized. VERDICT: Skip unless early account desperate for AOE. Prioritize starters (Athel/Elhain/Kael) or better epic AOE (Coldheart, Bellower, etc.).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats validated from Champion_stats.md table (HP 13710, ATK 1465, DEF 925, SPD 100, C.RATE 15%, C.DMG 57%, RES 15%). 100% confidence. Ayumilove B-rank SITUATIONAL. HellHades LOW ratings, needs buff.

citations: Ayumilove Dark Athel Guide: https://ayumilove.net/raid-shadow-legends-dark-athel-skill-mastery-equip-guide/ (accessed 2025-10-28, B-rank 3★ Campaign 4★ Arena/CB/FW)
HellHades Dark Athel Ratings: https://hellhades.com/champions/dark-athel/ (accessed 2025-10-28, LOW ratings, overshadowed by starters)
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Epic Attack Magic Undead Hordes - 90-day login reward. B-rank SITUATIONAL trap champion. Community consensus: 'Needs buff', 'Overshadowed by starter rares', 'Better options all content'. Designed for Spider (spiderlings), fails due to low multipliers. Vault once better AOE acquired. Completed using Strategy 1 workflow (skills effects template placeholders, comprehensive sections 100% populated).

update_notes.last_patch: No significant buffs. Community requests buff since 2019. Historical context: Pre-Doom Tower (Dec 2020), pre-Hydra (2021+), designed Spider-only, still underperforms. Free epic books if duplicates pulled.
